metadata.title: CVE-2022-21691 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: OnionShare is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymously share files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network. In affected versions chat participants can spoof their channel leave message, tricking others into assuming they left the chatroom.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
